text.config.minor-audio-inconvenience.op:
Enable or disable the mod. 
If disabled, the volume of sounds will not be changed. Does not interrupt currently playing sounds.
Display all playing sounds IDs in the subtitles. Does not hide duplicates.

List of sounds with custom volume.
Using the "Add forced volume to a sound" menu to add new sounds is recommended.

Format: namespace:id=volume
Add forced volume to a sound...
